mapper.delete: DELETE FROM purchase WHERE purse_id =(SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.`purse_id` FROM family f, purchase p WHERE f.`fly_id`=p.`purse_fly_id` AND f.`fly_id`=#{fly_id}) pid)
mapper.select: SELECT p.`purse_payMethod`,p.`purse_receipt`,p.`purse_payDate`,p.`purse_instPtl`FROM purchase p,family f WHERE f.`fly_id`=p.`purse_fly_id` AND f.`fly_id`=#{fly_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase p SET p.`purse_status`=1 WHERE p.`purse_fly_id`=#{purse_fly_id} and p.`purse_id`=#{purse_id}
mapper.select: SELECT f.`fly_id`,f.`fly_name`, f.`fly_phone`,f.`fly_IDcard`,f.`fly_doorNum`,f.`fly_birthday`,f.`fly_address`,p.`purse_status` FROM family f JOIN purchase p ON f.`fly_id`=p.`purse_fly_id` where true and fly_id=#{fly_id} order by f.fly_id desc

SELECT f.`fly_id`,f.`fly_name`,f.`fly_phone`,CONCAT(f.`fly_address`,f.fly_doorNum) fly_address,p.`purse_id`,k.kid,k.`k_status`,p.`purse_instPtl`,te.tem_ept_id,te.`tem_ept_type`,te. tem_ept_model,te.`tem_ept_facty`,SUM(k.`k_ept_num`) total FROM family f JOIN team t ON f.`fly_tem_id`=t.`tem_id` JOIN purchase p ON f.`fly_id`=p.`purse_fly_id` JOIN keeper k ON p.`purse_id`=k.`k_purse_id` JOIN team_ept te ON k.`k_ept_id`=te.`tem_ept_id` WHERE k.`k_status`=0 AND f.`fly_id`=#{fly_id} GROUP BY f.`fly_id`,te.`tem_ept_model`,te.`tem_ept_type`,te.`tem_ept_facty`
